amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to transfer flash-bang grenades.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer flash-bang grenades.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 265 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
